amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for the prohibition on funding of the Medium Extended Air Defense System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 136 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 5. Record Vote Number: 80.

action.text: Amendment SA 136 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Ayotte. (consideration: CR S2303-2307; text: CR S2305) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for the prohibition on funding of the Medium Extended Air Defense System.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 136 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 5. Record Vote Number: 80.
